sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' import BookImage from '../../asserts/js/images' export class BorrowedBook extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { const status = this.props.status == 'Borrowing' let textColor if (status) { textColor = {color: '#FB0000'} } else { textColor = {color: '#1429D7'} } return (
Status:
{this.props.status}
Borrowed Date:
{this.props.date}
Expire in:
{this.props.expire} days
{status? : }
) } }
